Learn how to structure and write unit tests for calendar functionality
Explore various test cases covering common calendar operations like date arithmetic, day-of-week calculations, and date range generation
Utilize pytest's built-in features such as fixtures, parameterized tests, and mocking
Discover best practices for testing edge cases and ensuring code coverage
version_notes: This guide focuses on Python 3.12+ due to its enhanced typing support and improvements in the standard library.
Note that many of the concepts and examples will still be applicable to earlier versions of Python with some adjustments.
